thread.title: Rihanna Evoked Black History With a Powerful Outfit at Dior’s Paris Fashion Week Show
thread.title_full: Rihanna Evoked Black History With a Powerful Outfit at Dior’s Paris Fashion Week Show

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Rihanna Evoked Black History With a Powerful Outfit at Dior’s Paris Fashion Week Show

organizations.name: city of light for paris fashion week

text:
As the great and the famous flock to the City of Light for Paris Fashion Week, it’s hard to think of another person whose mere presence creates anywhere near the same level of hysteria as Rihanna. With her latest FENTY PUMA collection not slated to show until later today, Bad Gal RiRi made sure her spare time was put to good use at Dior’s FW17 event.
Cut to a head-turning Rihanna revealing her preferred shade of blue, and sharing her favorite looks from #MariaGraziaChiuri's Autumn-Winter 2017-18 collection with us as she dashed backstage to congratulate our Artistic Director. 
A post shared by Dior Official (@dior) on Mar 5, 2017 at 7:05am PST 

Snapped on the street prior to the show, Rihanna’s all-black militaristic get up recalled the uniform of the former Black Panther Party. Keeping one hand in her pocket for effect at all times, the singer rocked a leather beret with black-out shades, a choker, a Dior wool overcoat and suede platform boots. Looks don’t come much more powerful than this.
Spotted backstage at our Autumn-Winter 2017-18 fashion show, our favorite gal Rihanna came to congratulate #MariaGraziaChiuri on the powerful collection she had just sent down the runway! #Latergram #PFW 
A post shared by Dior Official (@dior) on Mar 5, 2017 at 9:03am PST 

Stay tuned for further PFW news throughout the day, including a street style shoot from Rihanna’s aforementioned FENTY PUMA extravaganza.
Last year, we explored how the Black Panther’s influenced contemporary music and fashion.
